subject: Football
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The statements are the league’s most unvarnished admission yet that the sport’s professional participants sustain severe brain injuries at far higher rates than the general population.
snippet: The statements are the league’s most unvarnished admission yet that the sport’s professional participants sustain severe brain injuries at far higher rates than the general population.
